name: Battle Buddies
description:
Battle Buddies is a two player only, horizontal scrolling, arcade shooter game.

Controls for playing the game:

Player 1 Keys ---------------------------------------------

Up, Down, Left, and Right Arrow ---> character movement

U and J ---> activate ability

I, K, O, and L ---> switch ability

Player 2 Keys ---------------------------------------------

W, A, S, and D ---> character movement

R and F ---> activate ability

T, G, Y, and H ---> switch ability
